title: Number of operable nuclear reactor plants by country 2019
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Number of reactors in the y axis.
The Number of reactors is highest at Country United States and lowest at Country Iran.
The highest value at Country United States is 97.0x times more than the lowest value at Iran.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Number of reactors in the y axis.
The maximum Number of reactors 97.0 is found at Country United States and the minimum is found at Iran where Country is 1.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Number of reactors in the y axis.
The Number of reactors is highest at Country United States and lowest at Country Iran.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of reactors for 30 number of Countrys.
The Number of reactors is appeared to be the highest at Country United States and lowest at Country Iran.
There is a difference of 96.0 between the maximum Country United States and minimum Country Iran.
Country United States is higher than any other Countrys with value 97.0, followed by France, and China. Down to Country Iran with the lowest value 1.0.
Country Mexico, Romania, South Africa, Brazil, and Bulgaria have a similar Number of reactors that is 2.0.
The Country United States tends to be 6.58 percent higher than average.
